projects.title: Rent a Car Application
projects.description: This was an assignment; It's a web-application built with .NET with the use of Blazor and an API. It's a simple web-application with tests in the background that allows you to rent a car, add a car to the market and view your rental history. How to install and run the web-application is in the README.

projects.title: Bonelab Mods Hub
projects.description: It was a hub for community made mods for the game Bonelab. I made one of the first working avatars and it was sought after and as people were asking for my avatar more came out with nowhere to post them. I ended up making this repo as a hub for mods before Bonelab got support from Mod.io

projects.title: Destiny 2 API Scraper (Broken)
projects.description: A Python script that scrapes the Destiny 2 API for new items. I ended up wanting to automate it a bit further and incorperating a twitter/discord bot, doing so it broke down and I didn't have time to fix it. Someone finished a similar project later on so I chose to discontinue it. Source code is not available due to it being broken and pretty much useless.
